Package org.jacorb.orb

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BufferManagerFactory  
    CodeSet.InputBuffer
    This interface represents a buffer from which character data can be read.
    CodeSet.OutputBuffer
    Represents a buffer to which character data may be written.
    Forwarder  
    IBufferManager
    A BufferManager is used to share a pool of buffers and to implement a buffer allocation policy.
    ImRAccess  
    ProfileSelector
    A ProfileSelector decides, on the client side, which Profile from an object's IOR should be used to communicate with the object.
